0.248021968251576.name: days_since_signup
0.248021968251576.code:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

def days_since_signup(row):
    if pd.isnull(row['signup_date']):
        return np.nan
    signup_date = pd.to_datetime(row['signup_date'])
    return (pd.to_datetime("today") - signup_date).days

0.042633925072015535.name: has_made_transaction
0.042633925072015535.code:
def has_made_transaction(row, df_train: pd.DataFrame, aux_dataframes: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame]):
    transaction_data = aux_dataframes['transaction_data_table.csv']
    customer_transactions = transaction_data[transaction_data['customer_id'] == row['customer_id']]
    return 1 if len(customer_transactions) > 0 else 0

0.03316076736314155.name: customer_age
0.03316076736314155.code:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

def customer_age(row):
    if pd.isnull(row['birth_date']):
        return np.nan
    birth_year = pd.to_datetime(row['birth_date']).year
    return pd.to_datetime("today").year - birth_year

def gender_encoding(row):
    return 1 if row['gender'] == 'Male' else 0

import numpy as np

def preferred_payment_method(row, df_train: pd.DataFrame, aux_dataframes: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame]):
    transaction_data = aux_dataframes['transaction_data_table.csv']
    customer_transactions = transaction_data[transaction_data['customer_id'] == row['customer_id']]
    if len(customer_transactions) == 0:
        return np.nan
    return customer_transactions['payment_method'].mode().iloc[0]
